nodes.text: The Nikto Horoth Gendi formed his own gang upon being given control of the Nikto Sector, a region of the moon of Nar Shaddaa, by his Hutt master. Gendi used his gang to free himself from servitude, and the gang was the first in a line of Nikto gangs that controlled the district for years afterward.
Gendi's gang was first mentioned in the Codex entry for the Nikto Sector in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
